content: So we've got lots of good, to John's point earlier around brownfield, very efficient use of capital to have continued growth here for the next little while, where we know it makes sense that even in the conventional world, like don't be surprised if you see us probably add an incremental CAD100 million or so into next year to keep kind of driving the performance of that business, where as we fill more and utilize a lot of our infrastructure that has not been invested in the last five, six years.
